title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: Event Step
description: This is an event-driven step that responds to events emitted by other steps

title: Event Subscription
description: Subscribe to events from other steps to trigger this background job

title: Event Emission
description: Emit events when the background job completes to notify other parts of the system

title: Async Handler
description: Python handlers are async functions that can handle asynchronous operations

title: Context Extraction
description: Extract logger and emit functions from the context safely

title: Module Imports
description: Dynamic import of the pet store module with error handling

title: Input Processing
description: Extract and process input data from the triggering event

title: Background Processing
description: Perform background tasks like calculating feeding schedules and updating pet records

title: Error Handling
description: Handle errors gracefully and log them for monitoring

title: Handler
description: The handler function that executes when the subscribed event is received

title: Logger
description: Log background job progress and completion for monitoring and debugging

title: Workflow Integration
description: Integrate with the broader pet management workflow by emitting completion events
